piece.altTxt: A magazine-like spread that features voting information for the states of Rhode Island and South Carolina.
piece.title: Voter's guide
piece.desc: Voter's guide made from raw information compiled from across the web.

piece.title: Riso + Spaceman
piece.desc: I ran a photo I took of an astronaut model through the risograph printing process.
piece.altTxt: An image of a small astronaut model staring through the reflection on the ground. The color scheme is made of raw cyans, pinks, and yellows.
Stacked up beer cans branded 'Hillyer's Hops' with a gold text on black color scheme.
piece.title: Beer Labels
piece.desc: A branded beer label for a school fundraiser event.

piece.altTxt: A young boy in a red coat and red hat is caught in the middle of running. Bolts of electricity surround his energized gait.
piece.title: Illustration
piece.desc: Sometimes a quick doodle jolts the rest of my day.

piece.altTxt: A looping animation that reads 'See me, hear me, know me.' with images of an eye, mouth, and rings from the mind in between.
piece.title: Analog GIF
piece.desc: A test seeing how the artifacts from riso printing affects the typical GIF animation.

piece.altTxt: A person with glasses and short hair holds up an arm while holding a typical rock concert hand gesture. The clothes folds are delicately detailed throughout the shirt, pants, and shirt tied around the waist.
piece.title: Illustration
piece.desc: A study of how clothes folds and body parts behave in space.

piece.altTxt: The words 'Happy Friendship Day' are written onto a geometric and symmetrical background.
piece.title: Text Motion Graphic
piece.desc: Testing fluid text animation workflow through a social post.

piece.altTxt: A person with short hair looks off to the left. The linework is black and speckled with noise. The colors behind the linework are rectilinear. A blue box shows a text field with an ellipses.
piece.title: Illustration
piece.desc: A short test of color blocking.

piece.altTxt: A photo of stickers placed like graffiti along a wall. The lower height on the wall, the less stickers there are. Bright yellow and some reds and blacks dominate the scene.
piece.title: Riso + Sticker Graffiti
piece.desc: I ran a photo from my study abroad through the risograph printing process.

piece.altTxt: A publication spread shows a map of Afro-eurasia. Spread design by Sami, Creative and Art Direction by Ambica Prakash and Emily Cohane-Mann from Eighty2Degrees.
piece.title: Pardee-DU Annual Report
piece.desc: A spread from Pardee Center of Denver University's Annual Report for 2021.

piece.altTxt: A person with long hair holds up two fingers in a v shape in front of their eyes. They are wearing a mask and are staring in the direction of the viewer.
piece.title: Illustration
piece.desc: Remember to keep wearing you masks, everyone!

piece.altTxt: A red background has the subject in the middle. The subject is a golden yellow with long hair, their head topped with a bushels of blue flowers. A burning flower appears from the bottom.
piece.title: Illustration
piece.desc: A study of some of my favorite flowers from the old family garden.
